key_points: Tom Brady has seven Super Bowl rings and three Super Bowl losses.
The 2008 Super Bowl loss to the Giants impacted Brady significantly, as the Patriots had an undefeated season until that point.
Brady discussed how this loss motivated him in episode four of the ESPN series "Man in the Arena".
"Man in the Arena" is a 10-part documentary focusing on Brady's 10 Super Bowl appearances.
Brady speculated that winning the 2008 Super Bowl might have changed his desire to continue playing.
He emphasized learning from both positive and negative experiences and striving to improve.
Brady's overall Super Bowl record stands at 7-3.
The loss made the Giants the team Brady most wanted to defeat, a sentiment he still held in 2021.
Brady won his most recent Super Bowl in 2021 with the Buccaneers, defeating the Chiefs 31-9.
At 44, Brady has not announced plans for retirement and mentioned the possibility of playing until he is 50.
